title: When to refund 25$ RP card for bonus RP!

embed.description: i activated my $25 rp card and didnt get my bonus rp? help?

body: Could anyone please tell me when to refund my 25$ New Zealand  prepaid card because some people haven't been receiving the bonus RP{{champion:48}} .And I would like to know when i should refund my prepaid card for bonus RP!

replies.body: I say that you should refund it ASAP so that Riot still have access to it in their history. Usually, it's the longer you wait the less chance you have of success.
